name: Feed Grazarok
description:
You have to cut the food with a left click and throw the food with a right click when Grazarok, Destroyer of Worlds opens his mouth. Fill the void in his stomach and save mankind from his wrath.

Programs used:

  • Godot
  • Clip Studio
  • Gimp
  • Git
  • Audacity

The Team:

  • Raynorr: Game Designer
  • Pitivie: Programmer
  • Thiradil: Art design

Credit audio : lexica
